prompts: Create a ground-type Pokemon with a trio of cute faces and sandy textures.
I want a Pokemon that burrows underground, featuring three adorable heads and blonde hair.
Generate an image of a small, brown, ground-type Pokemon with distinct hairstyles and playful expressions.
Make a character design for a Pokemon that loves to dig, featuring three interconnected bodies and pink noses.
Imagine a Pokemon that lives in tunnels, characterized by its fuzzy heads and friendly demeanor.
Design a Pokemon with a unique body shape of three connected forms, showcasing earthy colors and a fun personality.
Show me a whimsical ground-type Pokemon with three heads, each with its own personality and hairstyle.
